name: Final Days (itch) (Luysery)
description:
Final Days is a WIP zombie/post-apocalypse game. It takes place in midwest USA. No storyline yet. VERY BUGGY.  Tell me what to improve on. Check back for more updates to come.

UPDATE*

Zombies added. They don't work but they walk and they're there.

Don't worry about the floating head, its not supposed to be there. 

More buildings and roads + a crashed airplane if you can find it. 

Flashlight on the player's head for better seeing at night.

Day, night, and weather cycle added.
